name: Klepto-Gnomics
description:
Klepto-Gnomics - the gnome economy of stealing
A resource tug-of-war combined with the kid's game, The Floor is Lava, Klepto-Gnomics is a local 2v2 multiplayer game where 4 players/gnomes shove each other into the lava and steal from their opponent's chests for their gems. Players can only respawn if there are gems in their team chest. A team wins once both their opponents are out and the opponents have no more gems in their chest.

Be wary of the constantly rising and falling lava!

Players will always be carrying one gem to keep them alive!

Once you have two gems, you can no longer shove and move slower! Plan your exit strategy wisely!

Team Chalk-Chalk
We are a team of 12 game designers, programmers, modelers, and artists that created both this game and the physical game it was inspired by in 5 days for Sheridan College's "Sprint Week", a game jam hosted every semester for the Game Design Program.

Check out a tutorial for the physical game here!

We had a lot of fun developing and play our game, we hope you and your friends enjoy playing it too!
